trans-unit.source: Represents a common dialog box that allows the user to specify a workflow theme to apply to a workflow design surface.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeConfigurationDialog> allows users to create and edit user-defined workflow themes and apply user-defined, default, and operating-system defined themes to a workflow design surface,
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeConfigurationDialog"></xref> class by using an <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref>.
The service provider that provides custom support to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeConfigurationDialog"></xref>.
serviceProvider contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeConfigurationDialog"></xref> class by using an <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> and <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref>.
The theme that is highlighted in the theme configuration dialog box is the theme that is currently applied to the workflow design surface.
Possible values include the default workflow theme, the operating system color theme, and any user-defined themes.
The service provider that provides custom support to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeConfigurationDialog"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> to be highlighted in the theme configuration dialog box in the workflow designer.
serviceProvider contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets the workflow theme that is highlighted in the theme configuration dialog box in the workflow designer.
The theme that is highlighted in the theme configuration dialog box is the theme that is currently applied to the workflow design surface.
Possible values include the default workflow theme, the operating system color theme, and any user-defined themes.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> that is highlighted in the theme configuration dialog box in the workflow designer.
